name: Oil Spill Racing
description:
Race from checkpoint to checkpoint to score time bonuses. Avoid oil spills that appear as you play, otherwise you'll run out of time. 

Share your top score for the 5 tracks in the comments

Controls:

  • 8 or 'w' = accelerate
  • 5 or 's' = reverse
  • 4 or 'a' = left
  • 6 or 'd' = right

Press '8' to start, '5' to select level

Made for Nokia Jam 3 with WebGL, packaged at 39KB!
